description: The linked encounters for a treatment day.

columns.name: REGIMEN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the treatment day in this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: A line number that uniquely identifies each linked encounter entry.

columns.name: TX_VISIT_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The visit types in the treatment day in this row.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of a patient encounter linked to the treatment day in this row.
